scripts.install: npm install url-loader && npm run install-bootstrap && npm run install-iconfont && npm run install-components && npm run install-stories
scripts.install-bootstrap: npm install -g grunt-cli && cd packages/timecrowd-bootstrap && npm install && npm link
scripts.install-iconfont: cd packages/timecrowd-iconfont && npm install && npm link
scripts.install-components: cd packages/timecrowd-components && npm install && npm link
scripts.install-stories: cd packages/timecrowd-stories && npm install && npm link timecrowd-bootstrap && npm link timecrowd-components
scripts.watch: npm run watch-bootstrap & npm run watch-components & npm run watch-stories
scripts.build: npm run build-bootstrap && npm run build-components && npm run build-stories
